name: Real Blood Therapy
description:
Terry, a young drug-addicted teenager, thinks he is a cinema actor. The scene he has to play ? Kill everyone. 

Through the help of the drug (and of your weapon), you must kill all enemies you encounter to end your scene with the best possible performance. Be warned, you will have to rehearse, because the final act is very complicated...

 -Quentin CHAILLEUX
